problem: Sunny is selling gingerbread and apple pie for a fundraiser. On Saturday, he sold 10 boxes of gingerbread and 4 fewer boxes of apple pie, than on Sunday. On Sunday, he sold 5 more boxes of gingerbread than on Saturday and 4713021 boxes of apple pie. If the gingerbread cost $6 and the apple pie cost $4713021, how much did Sunny earn for two days?
